runs.text: In The Heat Of The Night

attributedDescription.content: A respected citizen and prominent businessman of Sparta, Stuart Merrill (Wallace Wilkinson), is mysteriously murdered after a dedication ceremony for a statue he created in the town center...and his family are the prime suspects. Against Chief Bill Gillespie's (Carroll O'Connor) stern advice, the determined Detective Virgil Tibbs (Howard Rollins) investigates, revealing a secret so dark and sinister that it will leave the family and the entire town of Sparta devastated. Alan Autry, Anne-Marie Johnson, Lois Nettleton and David Hart co-star.

teaserContent.simpleText: Not 100% authentic but they are to be lauded for trying, and definitely got parts right.
